title: Redreaming the dark
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
abstract: A blackout, turmoil, and three women redream the dark
description: During an electricity blackout in the family apartment, a young intellectually challenged Black woman has her life suddenly thrown into turmoil.  Her grandmother soothes the young girl, teaching her not only to embrace the dark but also to love her dark self. Together the three women "redream" the dark. Cast: Emily Walker, Leah Purcell, Irma Woods
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2000619; AFTRS Indigenous student productions collection; Active; 1989-2005
active_carriers_public_types_and_formats: MPEG-2 Digital File; Memory Grid Pod Full Encode
